item.title: intigriti XSS Challenge Writeup - February 2023
item.description: tl;dr They are appending the image comment to a JSON using '{"imgName":"NFT.jpg","imgColorType": " '+strcol+' " ,"imgComment": " '+ strval +' "}' If any key is repeated JSON.parse will take only the last key-value pair. Then they are setting innerHTML as namfield.innerHTML = "Image name: " + temp.imgName; Give a","imgName":"<img src onerror=alert(document.domain) > as the image’s comment Solution Understanding the codeHere we can see that we have an NFT and we can change its accessories mouth etc.
